_sText: Hey! I just made a remake of the map surf_mai_remix! I made a new design and added a few secrets! I deleted the bombplace and added a Disco xD I also made a Top. You can activate a jail laser. I hope u will find the secret buttons to get to the secret room. Tip: Every of the 4 secret buttons is above a weapon automat. After u activated all 4 secret buttons in the right order you have to surf trough the first teleport, but from the backside. In the secret room you can heal and there is a buyzone. To get to the jail laser room damage a button (you have to search for it xD) and then you have to open a door (both in labyrinth) Tip: look in the labyrinth Maybe u know the camperboxes in front of the scout, i added a button to destroy the camper boxes. I ran some alphas & betas on my server. Almost all people like the map! I hope u also will! You can try the map on my server: 85.25.145.112:27016 Much fun! Sorry for my bad English, i am from Austria Nice greetings AndYZ >>> Servers hosting surf_mai maps <<< Video:
